info.title: Kuali Rice ${pom.version} Release Notes

sect1.title: Overview
sect1.para: This Release Notes documentation includes information on the list of changes between Rice ${previous.version} (released ${previous.reldate}) and Rice ${pom.version}. There are no upgrade instructions from Rice ${previous.version} to Rice ${pom.version} because should be a pure drop in replacement. There have been no database changes.
If you encounter any difficulty, please don't hesitate to contact the Rice team on our public collaboration mailing list at rice.collab@kuali.org
Kuali Rice ${pom.version} can be downloaded from the Rice website at .
There are three differient distributions of Rice available: source, binary and server. Please read the Installation Guide for more details on each of these distributions.
Documentation for this release can be found at at http://kuali.org/rice/docs/${pom.version}.
